website: Dr. Michael Hinckley, MD | West Jordan, UT | Healthgrades

reviews.description: Very good
The best one!
Perfect! Dr. Hinckley is among the best.

reviews.name: Betty Salamanikas
reviews.description: Dr Hinckley has treated me for skin cancer. He is very excellent and skilled doctor. Like him very much.
Good doctor and service.  Good personality and demeanor.

reviews.name: Carol Koller
reviews.description: I love going to Dr Hinckley for my dermatology needs! He’s so personable and so friendly, it’s like being with a lifelong friend! He explains everything completely and has a fun sense of humor! He’s so skilled and knowledgeable in his profession and I trust him completely! I’m so grateful to have him for my dermatologist!
Always had a great time and great experience. Helped us with all our issues. We are pleased
I’ve been a patient of Dr. Hinckley for over seven years. He’s friendly, professional and very skilled. I highly recommend him as a dermatologist.

reviews.name: Larry
reviews.description: Very well run office and good experience with the surgery. I recommend this office to anyone needed dermatologist treatment.

reviews.name: Karen
reviews.description: Dr Hinckley and his staff are amazing, they always take me back within minutes and sre so proficient with all they do.  Erika, the amazing nurse is so easy to talk to. She answered all of my questions and helped me feel calm and comfortable with the upcoming procedures. .

reviews.name: Gerald Bellon
reviews.description: A aver good experience.  No waiting and a very friendly staff.  The home made cookie was great.

reviews.name: Laura
reviews.description: As always my visit was perfect. When my previous dermatologist retired it made me nervous because how could I find someone as great as my previous dermatologist? Well, lucky me!!!! I found Dr. Hinckley. I have met with him 5 times now, and my husband has met with him once. Neither one of us have any complaints at all! I HIGHLY recommend Dr. Hinckley!

reviews.name: Jim and Sue Evans
reviews.description: He is very professional and personable we would recommend him to others
Very pleasant

reviews.name: Rett Christensen
reviews.description: Saw Dr. Hinckley for the first time...1st time check in was quick, simple, and I didn't wait more than 5 minutes. Age spots and pre cancer lesions were clearly discussed with options, and treatments applied. I was able to make informed decisions and Dr. Hinckley quickly took care of the chosen path....very, very happy with the outcome.

reviews.name: Aaron Acosta
reviews.description: He's excellent doctor he take care of me and thanks to him I'm save of cancer
Didn't wait long to see Dr Hinkley although he had full schedule that day; very friendly and gave good adv. for me to decide if I really want to do the non-urgent procedures.
Professional

reviews.name: Bruce Craft
reviews.description: Everyone was friendly and attentive.

reviews.name: Gary North
reviews.description: In a follow up visit to a successful cancer removal surgery Dr. Hinckley told me that he’d be happy to minimize the scar for no charge. I’m Extremely happy with the care provided by him and his staff!
